title: League of Legends Movie
body: Wouldn't it be Cool, if Riot made a Movie about League of legends, sort of like Blizzard did with World of Warcraft? there's so much potential content to make one! Surely i cant be alone with these thougts?

replies.body: They couldn't pull it off with Warcraft lore. You really think anything could be done with this?
The Warcraft film, got pretty Famous!

> [{quoted}](name=Wolfy015,realm=EUW,application-id=EBBIvmVK,discussion-id=MtLBgAVK,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-01-12T15:40:13.866+0000)
>
> The Warcraft film, got pretty Famous!

No, World of Warcraft is famous. I'm pretty sure most people have forgotten about the movie, because it was pretty awful. We don't need another terrible video game movie.

1. League of Legends is the most famous PC game out there,
2. WoW is a Dying game.
3. Warcraft has a 7/10 rating
4. League has a lot more lore than WoW

> [{quoted}](name=Wolfy015,realm=EUW,application-id=EBBIvmVK,discussion-id=MtLBgAVK,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2019-01-12T16:01:47.208+0000)
>
> 1. League of Legends is the most famous PC game out there,
> 2. WoW is a Dying game.
> 3. Warcraft has a 7/10 rating
> 4. League has a lot more lore than WoW

4 . LMAO

WoW is more famous, and isn't dying. Numbers spike up when an expansion hits, then drift downward until the next one. Basically the only people who watched the movie were WoW fans, and it was still mediocre. LoL's lore is basically a pile of retcon fanfics with more holes than Swiss cheese at this point, while WoW's lore is actually Warcraft's lore, which has been accumulating since the mid 90s. There's no need to make "LoL: We Have A Movie Now" just to check that ☑ box.
